UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the CharcoalChat application, identified by a randomly generated ID and a chosen display name. There is no traditional user authentication, so this profile primarily serves to identify messages sent by a particular client session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity. This is the randomUserID generated for a user's session.

displayName.description: The chosen display name for the user, used to identify them in chat conversations.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this user profile was first created.

Room.title: Room
Room.description: Represents a chat room where users can exchange messages. Each room has a unique identifier.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Room entity. This is the unique roomID generated for a chat session.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the chat room was created.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single text message sent within a chat room, potentially in reply to another message.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Message entity.

roomId.description: Reference to the Room where this message was sent.

senderId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who sent this message.

senderDisplayName.description: The display name of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The actual text content of the message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

replyToId.description: ID of the message being replied to, if any.

replyToContent.description: Content of the message being replied to (denormalized).

replyToSenderDisplayName.description: Display name of the sender of the replied message (denormalized).

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user's anonymous session.

definition.description: Stores metadata for each chat room.

params.name: roomId

params.description: The unique identifier of the parent chat room.
